description: A live stream polling bot. Viewers can vote on which items are sent to the multiworld!

votipelago-0.1.4.description:
# A Twitch polling client where chat votes on what items are sent to the multiworld!

- DeathLink sending
- Saving Twitch Credentials
- Rebrand

If version 0.1.2 or lower was installed, please install Archipelago again and install the smaller dependency package once more using the new instructions.

Please start your Archipelago Launcher with either` ap_launcher_ssl_fix.sh` for Linux/Mac or `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.bat` for Windows if you receive an SSL error.

Please read `votipelago_en.md` for setup instructions.
votipelago-0.1.4.title: Votipelago 0.1.4

votipelago-0.1.5.description:
# A Twitch polling client where chat votes on what items are sent to the multiworld!
- Death Link Time Stretches
- Death Links add deathlinks to the option pool
- Death Link fixes

If version 0.1.2 or lower was installed, please install Archipelago again and install the smaller dependency package once more using the new instructions.

Please start your Archipelago Launcher with either `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.sh` for Linux/Mac or `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.bat` for Windows if you receive an SSL error.

Please read `votipelago_en.md` for setup instructions.
votipelago-0.1.5.title: Votipelago 0.1.5

votipelago-0.1.6.description:
# A Twitch polling client where chat votes on what items are sent to the multiworld!
- Minor and Major Time Stretches as traps
- Custom poll is here message (leave blank to turn off)

If version 0.1.2 or lower was installed, please install Archipelago again and install the smaller dependency package once more using the new instructions.

Please start your Archipelago Launcher with either `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.sh` for Linux/Mac or `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.bat` for Windows if you receive an SSL error.

Please read `votipelago_en.md` for setup instructions.
votipelago-0.1.6.title: Votipelago 0.1.6

votipelago-0.1.7.description:
# A Twitch polling client where chat votes on what items are sent to the multiworld!
## Changes:
- Users can force a poll to appear.
- Users can force a poll to close with no items sent.
- Users can clear all deathlinks in the pool.

##

Please start your Archipelago Launcher with either `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.sh` for Linux/Mac or `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.bat` for Windows if you receive an SSL error.

Please read `votipelago_en.md` for setup instructions.
votipelago-0.1.7.title: Votipelago 0.1.7

# A Twitch polling client where chat votes on what items are sent to the multiworld!
## Changes:

Please read `votipelago_en.md` for setup instructions.
votipelago-0.1.8.title: Votipelago 0.1.8

votipelago-0.1.9.description:
# A Twitch polling client where chat votes on what items are sent to the multiworld!
## Changes:
- Removed an import. Discord.py is not part of votipelago. This should allow it to startup.

##

Please start your Archipelago Launcher with either `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.sh` for Linux/Mac or `ap_launcher_ssl_fix.bat` for Windows if you receive an SSL error.

Please read `votipelago_en.md` for setup instructions.
votipelago-0.1.9.title: Votipelago 0.1.9
